ptolemy.vergil.toolbox

Class SnapConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.vergil.toolbox.SnapConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    diva.canvas.interactor.PointConstraint

    public class SnapConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements diva.canvas.interactor.PointConstraint
    This constraint ensures that a point is a multiple of a constant that defaults to 5.0.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 2.0
    Author:
    Edward A. Lee
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (johnr)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (eal)
